Seasonal guidelines 
Season Diet regimen Activities regimen
Spring (Mar - Apr)Light, dry, bitter, hot 
& astringent foods such as honey, wheat,  barley are best.  Heavy, oily foods and sweet, 
sour tastes should be 
reduced/ avoided.Moderate exercise, oil and powder massage, fomentations, steam, use of lukewarm water for bath and drinking. Avoid day sleeping.
Summer (May-Jun.)Sweet, cold, oily, light, liquid food items, seasonal fruits, milk, rice, barley, sweets, butter milk, coconut 
water, cold drinks 
such as prepared from sandalwood, rose, etc. can be taken. Hot, sour, spicy, salty, pungent foods and over eating is best avoided.Exercise and sexual activities must be minimised.
